price: (Abosomsomfoͻ no de asoͻden saa ara) kͻpem εberε a, wͻbɛhunu deε yɛahyε wͻn ho bͻ no, εhͻ na wͻbɛhunu obi a n’aboafoͻ nni ahoͻden na (wͻn) dodoͻ nso yε kakraabi.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yūʿadūna fasayaʿlamūna man aḍʿafu nāṣiran wa-aqallu ʿadadan
